title: 1 Bedroom (large), Wash and Dryer IN UNIT 8 Plex
posting_body: Note: We have new asphalt with new striping and apartment numbers.
We have not updated our pictures due to weather.
Meadow Creek Apartments has a very clean Large 1bedroom 1bath apartment on the second floor.

The clean Large apartment includes soft quiet carpet, vinyl, NEW counter tops, closet shelves....that double your closet space, we have all thermal pane windows with screens, in our apartment we have new light fixtures,  a NEW dishwasher, and a NEW full size Washer/Dryer, NEW Paint, one piece tub enclosure for easy cleaning, NEW sink and faucet in kitchen and bath with a NEW vent hood above the stove.

The Apartment home also features assigned private and numbered parking in front of your home, the home has a separate dining room with a new chandler and has LED thru out, walk-in closet entre and bedroom, and large square footage.
Your apartment home sits quiet beautifully landscaped neighborhood, you couldn't ask for a better location!
Close to shopping, schools and is on a Bus line.
This is a Smoke Free community, No smoking on the property.
Office is located at: 7812 59th Ave West Lakewood, WA 98499  Viewings are by appointment only.
